description: HTML source file for a database visualizer web interface, including CSS styles and client-side JavaScript for browsing and visualizing database tables and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets the UI to initial state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content based on data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or objects.
